unnormalised: **Bollywood Buzz: Is Ranbir Kapoor Really Secretly Craving…Biryani?!**
normalised: **Bollywood Buzz: Is Ranbir Kapoor Really Secretly Craving…Biryani?!**

unnormalised: Namaste, gossip-loving aunties and uncles! Your friendly neighbourhood chugalkhor is back with the latest scoop hotter than a Madras summer. Forget the share market, THIS is the real investment – in juicy celebrity secrets!
normalised: Namaste, gossip-loving aunties and uncles! Your friendly neighborhood chugalkhor is back with the latest scoop hotter than a Madras summer. Forget the share market, THIS is the real investment – in juicy celebrity secrets!

unnormalised: First up: whispers are circulating faster than a Mumbai local train about Ranbir Kapoor. Forget Alia Bhatt, rumour has it Ranbir's been spotted ordering *extra* spicy Hyderabadi biryani from this tiny dhaba near Film City three nights in a row. THREE! Sources (read: my cousin's friend's sister who works as a spot girl) say he even asked for *extra* mirchi! Is this some kind of coded message? Is he secretly competing in a biryani-eating contest? Or maybe, just maybe, the man just really likes biryani? The world may never know.

Sources (read: my cousin's friend's sister who works as a spot girl) say he even asked for *extra* mirchi! Is this some kind of coded message? Is he secretly competing in a biryani-eating contest? Or maybe, just maybe, the man just really likes biryani? The world may never know.

unnormalised: Then there's Deepika Padukone. Word on the street (specifically, Linking Road, Bandra) is that she's been attending pottery classes. Pottery! Apparently, she wants to make her own personalized diyas for Diwali. Talk about keeping it real! We’re picturing her covered in clay, looking radiant as ever. Perhaps she’ll gift some to Ranveer? Now THAT’S a Diwali dhamaka we’d pay to see!

unnormalised: And speaking of dhamakas, have you heard about Priyanka Chopra’s supposed “feud” with Katrina Kaif? Apparently, they both showed up at the Ambani bash wearing the *exact* same shade of emerald green. Oh, the horror! The Indian Express went into a frenzy. Apparently, both ignored each other the entire evening. The tension was thicker than a plate of dal makhani!

unnormalised: Finally, a little birdie (who may or may not work at Yash Raj Studios) told us that Varun Dhawan has been secretly practicing kathak for a future role. Kathak! Can you imagine the Dhawans doing *adaa* and *nazakat*? We certainly can!

unnormalised: So, there you have it, folks. Enough masala to keep you going until next week. Until then, keep your ears to the ground, your eyes on the paparazzi, and remember: gossip is just information with a little bit of spice! Jai Hind! And don't forget to order some biryani!
